config.delay.name: NPC Reaction Delay (ms)
config.delay.tooltip: Delay before NPC plays the emote.
config.distance.name: Event Distance (tiles)
config.distance.tooltip: Max distance in tiles for NPC to react.
config.gain.name: Friendship Points
config.gain.tooltip: Friendship points to be gained after using an emote with an NPC, Once per day, set to 0 to disable( 1 Heart Mean 250 point).
